title: Is celebrating birthdays kufr? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: from turkey he says if someone is pressured to celebrate or to participate in birthdays would that be kufur because they heard that someone said it's originally from a pagan uh tradition and it's blah blah blah no it's not kufur at all this is imitating the disbelievers but it's a sin not a kufor there is no disbelief in it and allah knows best
